original_text: God is able to keep you safe so that you continue to trust him. One day you will stand in front of him and you will be very happy. God will bring you to that place and you will be completely good. You will be able to stand near to God, who shines with beautiful light.
korean_text: 능히 너희를 보호하사 거침이 없게 하시고 너희로 그 영광 앞에 흠이 없이 기쁨으로 서게 하실 이

sentences.original_text: God is able to keep you safe
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 안전하게 지킬 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: so that you continue to trust him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 계속해서 그를 신뢰할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: One day you will stand in front of him
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 당신은 그 앞에 서게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and you will be very happy
God will bring you to that place
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 그 곳으로 이끄실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and you will be completely good
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 완전히 선하게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will be able to stand near to God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님 가까이 설 수 있을 것입니다
